summary: Nirthor Bjorngard is descendant of the earliest Nords that inhabited Skyrim and witnessed Ysmir ascended to godhood as Talos.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first NPC that I have created. He carries a Skyforge Greatsword and wears alternative Jarl clothing as his default outfit. I hope he serves you well.

Located: Windhelm, Candlehearth Hall

Mods used to improve character appearance
The face map I use is High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141/?
The High res scar mod by Xenius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784/?

Weapon skin in this mod is Skyforge Weapons by Dreogan
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36815/?
author: Nikko180
